title: Mobile-Based Cardiovascular Metabolic Disease Health Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and core concepts in chronic disease management
context.additional_context: Emphasis on self-directed learning using mobile apps in BYOD environments. Provides case-based content for practical application

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five major risk factors for cardiometabolic diseases.
Learners set personalized health goals (diet/exercise/sleep) using a mobile app and achieve a compliance rate of 80% or higher.
Learners achieve a score of 85 or above (out of 100) in a disease management knowledge assessment through in-app quizzes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
